message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $115. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it for $100?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm looking for a bit more than that. How about we meet in the middle at $108?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, could we possibly agree on $105 for the product?
